MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterObjectBound (object punk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterObjectBound(object punk) cil managed

remarks.para: For more information, please see the existing documentation for IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound in the MSDN library.

summary.para: Register the passed object as one of the objects that has been bound during a moniker operation and which should be released when it is complete.

Docs.param: The object to register for release.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterObjectParam (string pszKey, object punk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterObjectParam(string pszKey, object punk) cil managed

remarks.para: For more information, please see the existing documentation for IBindCtx::RegisterObjectParam in the MSDN library.

summary.para: Register the given object pointer under the specified name in the internally-maintained table of object pointers.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReleaseBoundObjects ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReleaseBoundObjects() cil managed

remarks.para: For more information, please see the existing documentation for IBindCtx::ReleaseBoundObjects in the MSDN library.

summary.para: Releases all the objects currently registered with the bind context by .

MemberSignature.Value: public void RevokeObjectBound (object punk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RevokeObjectBound(object punk) cil managed

remarks.para: For more information, please see the existing documentation for IBindCtx::RevokeObjectBound in the MSDN library.

summary.para: Removes the object from the set of registered objects that need to be released.

Docs.param: The object to unregister for release.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RevokeObjectParam (string pszKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RevokeObjectParam(string pszKey) cil managed

remarks.para: For more information, please see the existing documentation for IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam in the MSDN library.

summary.para: Revoke the registration of the object currently found under this key in the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters, if any such key is currently registered.
